meanings.definition: Having no hair on the head.
meanings.sent1: The man was completely bald, with no hair on his head.
meanings.sent2: She noticed her grandfather was bald, with a shiny head.
meanings.sent3: The bald baby doll looked quite funny with its smooth head.
meanings.sent4: The bald mountain peak stood stark against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The bald eagle soared majestically in the sky, its head gleaming in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Lacking a natural or usual covering.
meanings.sent1: The bald tree stood out in the forest without its usual leaves.
meanings.sent2: The bald spot on the ground was where the grass refused to grow.
meanings.sent3: The bald truth was finally revealed, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The bald fact was staring them in the face, impossible to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The bald horizon stretched endlessly before them, devoid of any landmarks.
